did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Ellen Jacobs' Collection of Children's Books on Labor, 2000-2013
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: A collection of children's books that illustrate labor and especially organized labor.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Ellen Jacobs' Collection of Children's Books on Labor #6417 PUBS. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Brave Girl: Clara and the Shirtwaist Makers' Strike of 1909

scopecontent.p: By Michelle Markel. Pictures by Melissa Sweet.
By Drew Daywalt. Pictures by Oliver Jeffers.

did.unittitle: Miles of Smiles: The Story of Roxy, the Long Island Rail Road Dog

scopecontent.p: Story by Heather Hill Worthington. Illustrations by Bill Farnsworth.

did.unittitle: Click, Clack, Moo: Cows That Type

scopecontent.p: By Doreen Cronin. Pictures by Betsy Lewin.
